calc.lib package¶

Reusable code: constants, functions, classes.

calc.lib.slugify(value)¶

Make a string URL- and filename-friendly.

Normalizes string into unicode, converts to lowercase, removes non-alpha-nu- merics, and converts spaces to hyphens.

Taken from django/utils/text.py. In Django, a “slug” is a URL- and filename- friendly string.

Parameters:value (unicode) – String to be converted
Returns:Filename-friendly string
Return type:unicode
Raises:TypeError – if value is not unicode string
calc.lib.periodic_table = number symbol name group period ...¶

Periodic table. pandas.DataFrame read from periodic_table.xlsx.

class calc.lib.Graph¶

Bases: collections.OrderedDict

adjacency list.

add_node(n)¶

Given \(n\notin G\), consider \(G\cup\{n\}\).

Parameters:n (Node) – Node to be added
add_edge(src, dst)¶

Given \(s,d\in G \,\bigwedge\, \neg (s\to d)\), consider \(G\cup\{s\to d\}\).

Parameters:
  • src (Node) – Source node
  • dst (Node) – Destination node
del_edge(src, dst)¶

Given \(\{s\to d\}\subset G\), consider \(G - \{s\to d\}\)

Parameters:
  • src (Node) – Source node
  • dst (Node) – Destination node
del_node(n)¶

Given \(n\in G\), consider \(G - \{n\to m\}\forall m - \{m\to n\}\forall m\)

Parameters:n (Node) – Node to be deleted
